HomeWiki:
########## Collection Variables Editor - 1.0 ###########
           --------------------------------------------------------

https://thumbsupcode.wordpress.com/2015/07/28/sccm-collection-variables-editor-sccm-2012/

Helps copying Collection Variables from One collection to another collections for System Center Configuration Manager 2012. It also can generate CollectionVaribles.xml export of Variables for later use or in other SCCM
Site.

  1. Prerequisites

.NET Framework 4.5
Microsoft SCCM 2012 Console
User should have access to Create collection and modify collection.

  1. Installation instruction



1. Launch the CollVariEditorSetup.msi
2. Run following command to install it silently - msiexec /i CollVariEditorSetup.msi /q /L*V "%Windir%\debug\CollVariEditorSetup.log"

Note :- SCCM 2012 Console should be installed in default location of C:\Progra~\Microsoft Config~\AdminConsole~
